channel.title: Topaz|Mono County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Topaz|Mono County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-395 South - Sierra Pass Information
item.description: Sierra pass closure information on US-395 south. Information for Sonora Pass (CA-108) and Tioga Pass (CA-120). At the time this photo was taken both passes were open.

item.title: US-395 North at CA-89 North
item.description: US-395 south at CA-89 north to Markleeville. This is the southern end of CA-89.

item.title: US-395 South at CA-89
item.description: US-395 south at CA-89 North to Markleeville and Monitor Pass. Monitor Pass was open when this was taken. This is the southern end of CA-89.

item.title: US-395 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker to Nevada, Carson City, and Reno on US-395 north in Topaz.

item.title: US-395 North at CA-89 North
item.description: Distance marker to Markleeville on US-395 north at CA-89 junction in Topaz. This is the southern end of CA-89.

item.title: US-395 South at CA-89
item.description: US-395 north at CA-89 junction to Markleeville and Monitor Pass in Topaz. Monitor Pass is closed when this was taken.
